Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I want to know if its possible to resize some cockpits, i want to make Ke-111 from SXT mod to 2,5 m.

I saw searching for new cockpits some planes with Ke-111 at 2,5 but i have tweakscale and i can't resize this cockpit.

Maybe is the version?? I have Tweakscale 2.3 in KSP 1.2 and SXT Continued 0.3

The purpose of this is to make a big b-29 or something of this size

Thanks to all!!!

I know that you can resize stock cockpits, but modded ones? It all depends on the compatibility. 

Edited November 20, 2017 by Lo Var Lachland
Alternatively you can use Module Manager to create a copy of the part in a new size, but this way you can customize the other values such as mass and crew capacity.
